name: Iceberg Defender (Remake)
description:
Original: https://equipo-10.itch.io/iceberg-defender

Story: Would you help a "helpless" penguin to defend his cozy home?

CONTROLS

Movement: Arrows.

Aim: Mouse.

 Shoot: Left click.
